text: A yesli My dadim yemu vkusit' Nashey milosti posle kakogo libo ogorcheniya, postigshego yego, to on govorit: "Eto - moye! I chto mne dumat', chto nastupit chas? A yesli ya i vozvrashchus' ko Gospodu moyemu, to dlya menya u nego vse nailuchsheye". - Istinno, nevernym My vozvestim to, chto delali oni, i zastavim ikh vkusit' zhestokuyu muku
